channel.title: Cheating
channel.description: I wanted to know if cheating was a problem for people that host a server here. If so, what kind?

item.title: Cheating
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:27, topic:243187”]1.) multiple accounts trading to gain from starter items = ruins good WELL MADE servers that are 24 / 7 ect
2.) duping in soo many ways
3.) trade glitch which makes both people trading lose items
4.) admins trading to their best buddies with pickup items

^ Don’t know if you meant this but what the heck…[/quote]

  1. Dont have a over powered starter pack
  2. Alot of servers have dupes, but they can be fixed
  3. Iu no
  4. Dont allow admins to pickup or trade

When i hosted my server, we would get alot of Auto Clicking and Auto Typers. I ended those, but people still found ways threw.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheating

item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Not really a cheat, but server flooding is also fun to do, when you get the idiots who download some pre-made source like figment (or whatever the fuck they’re using now) and only change the name and give themselves “owner”

item.title: Cheating
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:25, topic:243187”]Cheating is never a problem if you actually stop it. If you don’t, then you deserve to have people cheating on your server. I love to cheat on the few servers I play (that’s once in a blue moon). <3 duping.[/quote]… really lol… The whole reason he’s asking what most people’s problems are with cheaters is most likely because he is trying to figure ways of improving it, thus stopping the cheating…

Sadly, you’re not going to get anything from this section thief, because everyone has to be a smart ass about how this isn’t section related, or they’re just going to troll and get off topic on it.

If i were to say anything about cheating problems while hosting, it would have to be the noclip on the cheating clients. Besides that, it’s pretty much less cheating as a matter and more of generally the quality of the server’s performance. If anyone has a problem, the majority of them are going to say that it laggs, or people have the cheating client.

[quote=“I Uk 0wn4g3 I, post:16, topic:243187”]I PK Pigeons who are you to tell someone what to do your like 8, and have joined this community like 10mins ago so gtfo pl0x, kthxbai.[/quote]Btw, you should understand that no matter when they join, they could be more intelligent than you assume them to be. In this case, smarter than you.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheating
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Cheating is never a problem if you actually stop it. If you don’t, then you deserve to have people cheating on your server. I love to cheat on the few servers I play (that’s once in a blue moon). <3 duping.

Read full topic

How should it be in the help section?

Server Help Got a tricky problem to solve? Ask your question and someone may be able to resolve it.

Where in that does it say also ask your general questions here, I know it shouldn’t be posted here but there isn’t really a place to post it and it could turn into a development, say if he was going to make something to prevent people ‘Cheating’.

He’s a Mopar Vet not an Idiot
